manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Soft Touch Handles The T-Fal Titanium Advanced cookware set has riveted soft touch handles that are ergonomically designed for a comfortable and safe grip. Handles are oven safe up to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Thermo-Spot Proper preheating to seal in food's flavor is a breeze with the patented T-fal Thermo-Spot, which clearly indicates when the pan has reached the optimal temperature to begin cooking. Titanium Advanced Nonstick Interior A special process creates a non-stick cooking surface reinforced with Titanium for the ultimate durability and longest lasting performance. The Titanium Advanced nonstick interior provides amazing food release and removes the fear of using metal utensils while cooking in non-stick pans.

Ideas You Can't Live Without Present in 120 countries, T-fal's mission is to offer ingenious products to make cooking simpler and more rewarding as well as making ironing easier and faster. T-fal is dedicated to understanding the consumer's needs and bringing innovative solutions. T-fal's history is marked with world-class innovations.

Product T-fal C530SC Signature Nonstick Expert Thermo-Spot Heat Indicator Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 12-Piece, Black T-fal B167SI Initiatives Nonstick Inside and Out Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe Cookware Set, 18-Piece, Charcoal T-fal E765SH Ultimate Hard Anodized Scratch Resistant Titanium Nonstick Thermo-Spot Heat Indicator Anti-Warp Base Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe PFOA Free Cookware Set, 17-Piece, Gray T-fal C561SC Titanium Advanced Nonstick Thermo-Spot Heat Indicator Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 12-Piece, Black Thermo-Spot ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Material Type Aluminum Aluminum Aluminum Aluminum Interior Coating Non-Stick Non-Stick Non-Stick Non-Stick Oven Safe 350 Degrees F 350 Degrees F 400 Degrees F 350 Degrees F Metal Utensil Safe ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great pan. Good size, used every day, easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has become my most used and favorite pan. It’s sturdy, heats evenly, and is nonstick as promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid nonstick coating
reviews.reviewText: The nonstick coating works great and has not come off. We've owned this for well over a year and it hasn't peeled or scratched. Love that it's dishwasher safe. Would order more T-fal pans as it has held up better than other nonstick ones we've purchased in the past. It also is made with this indicator that turns read when the pan is all preheated. Very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: For this price, this pan is pretty good value! I bought this as an every day non-stick that I don't have to worry about too much (in addition to my Zwilling for french ommelettes and such). It heats up very quickly with decent heat distribution. The base is even and does an alright job at keeping oil in the center of the pan. I haven't experienced any distortion of the base yet, even though I've left it on higher heat than I should at times. The non-stick seems to be holding up too and it's very easy to clean. Definitely not the best nonstick I've ever used, but I'm happy using this for every day quick scrambled eggs and such :)Edit: I ordered the 8 inch first and it was TINY! Looked smaller than the 8 inch pan I was replacing. Reodered the 10.5 inch and it's the perfect size for making a large omelette or a quesadilla.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best small fry pan
reviews.reviewText: This pan never sticks and heats up evenly. I've had mine for two years now and no troubles, cooks like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing sticks & cleans easily.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pan, because I have a larger version that I’ve used for 4 years that has been the best frying pan I’ve ever owned. I’ve purchased expensive ceramic pans that don’t work nearly as well. This little pan gets used almost every morning & is just as good as the larger TFal pan that I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Time will tell!
reviews.reviewText: At first use, this pan seems great. Nice size and cooked the burger very well. Hope it lasts better than my last one; but, time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I see no problems with it and it was a bargain for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have used it several times and its great. However if after months the surface comes off I have no way of knowing that and not sure if it will allow me to give another review after a period of months. Be sure the buy the lid which I did not since I have alot of the glass lids which I thought would fit since there about 3 main generic sizes but the 10.5 diameter is unusual so you should pay for the lid. I am 68 and the people that say the coating can come off I bet they were overheated or food got forgotten and burned dry. It is non stick however eggs dont slide around which I prefer they dont but you touch the eggs they fly right out. also the black color helps with heat--white or copper colored pans do not cook right and you can tell it. also the handle is light weight--it does not force the pan to tilt--such as pans where the eggs slide over to one side-it sits flat and with the rubbery handle you can pick it right up. The pan does not have a super thick stainless steel bottom like expensive pans but the benefit is its very light weight such as for picking it up also for moving where you dont load up a ton of cast iron. If people are older its hard to pick up a super heavy pan and exerts extreme force on the wrist this one dosent. BUT BUY THE LID. lid is specifically designed for the exact pan. you wont find one at goodwill.
the best fry pan I've ever used

reviews.reviewTitle: Le pus important c'est (quand ça colle pas) !
reviews.reviewText: Sans rire il y a longtemps que j'utilise T-fal et mes parent avant de plus j'ai utilisé d'autres marques mais pour revenir et garder mes anciens T-fal juste que j'ai rajeuni mon T-fal et j'ai une batterie extra !

Estoy muy feliz con mi compra, ya llevo más de un mes usándolo todos los días y funciona muy bien, no se le pega nada, yo utilizo un poco de aceite. La calidad del sarten me gustó mucho, es grueso y se siente resistente, para lavarlo solo utilizo un sácate suave y siempre uso espátula de plástico de T-fal. Lo recomiendo al 100%, para una persona normal como yo es suficiente.
Hope it lasts long. Claimed to be 2x titanium.So far so good.
